column4: Escott ok I used screen then disconnected from my server and logged back in. How do I reattach to the screen session I started previously?
, no, actually i haven't , on gentoo i have
you keep the private key in .ssh then run that command on the serverside user .ssh

there are bruteforce attacks that do not work with private/ public key
i mean you are subject to them

to the 'user' you want to connect to
